DOC.brief_summary: Management lung cancer remain controversial elderly patient ( pt ) often exclude clinical trial . We present survey perform management lung cancer pt age 70 France . All pt age 70 histo/cytologically proved lung cancer diagnose sept 02 oct 03 participate center record characteristic , diagnostic procedure , therapeutic management survival analyse .
DOC.brief_title: A FRENCH SURVEY OF THE DIAGNOSTIC AND THERAPEUTIC MANAGEMENT OF ELDERLY PEOPLE WITH HISTOLOGICALLY/CYTOLOGICALLY CONFIRMED LUNG CANCER .
